get.description: Get the programme for a given programme identifier.

get.summary: Child episodes for a given programme pid.
get.description: Get the child episodes belonging to a given programme identifier.
Get the episode for a given episode identifier.
Get the Programmes whose title begins with the given initial character.

parameters.name: letter
parameters.description: Letter to search by, a to z or the string '0-9'

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sort order of the results.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date to return the schedule for, yyyy-mm-dd format

get.summary: List the highlights for a channel.
get.description: Get the editorial highlights of a given channel in TV & iPlayer.
Get the list of all the categories in TV & iPlayer.

get.summary: List all the programmes for a category.
get.description: Get the list of all the Programmes (TLEOs) for a given category in TV & iPlayer.

get.summary: List all the episodes for a category.
get.description: Get the list of all the episodes for a given category in TV & iPlayer.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sort order of the results.

get.description: Get the current iPlayer business layer status. This tells the caller the status of the iPlayer data, but not necessarily the overall status of the website. In the future it might include the status of the dependent data services within the BBC.
Get the list of all the channels TV & iPlayer.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: The region to get the channels for.

get.summary: Get episodes by group, brand or series
get.description: Get episodes by group, brand or series

get.summary: List the highlights for a category.
get.description: Get the editorial highlights of a given category in TV & iPlayer.
Get the list of all the regions TV & iPlayer.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Time to return results from, e.g. -3h

rights.name: rights
rights.description: The rights group to limit results to.

availability.name: availability
availability.description: Whether to return all, or available programmes

initial_child_count.name: initial_child_count
initial_child_count.description: The depth to return child entities.

mixin.name: mixin
mixin.description: Request additional data in the output

per_page.name: per_page
per_page.description: The number of results to return.

sort_direction.name: sort_direction
sort_direction.description: Whether to sort ascending or descending

lang.name: lang
lang.description: The language for any applicable localised strings.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel identifier to limit results to.

category.name: category
category.description: The category identifier to return results from.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: The sort order of the results.
